title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
plot: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.
writers: Gil Kenan, Jason Reitman, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis
stars: Finn Wolfhard, Mckenna Grace, Carrie Coon, Sigourney Weaver

tagline: If there's something strange in your neighborhood, Then you know who to call.

similars.title: Ghostbusters
similars.plot: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.
similars.stars: Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon

similars.title: Ghostbusters
similars.plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.
similars.stars: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver

similars.title: Ghostbusters II
similars.plot: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.
similars.stars: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver

similars.title: Jungle Cruise
similars.plot: Based on Disneyland's theme park ride where a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles but with a supernatural element.
similars.stars: Dwayne Johnson, Emily Blunt, Edgar Ramrez

similars.title: Morbius
similars.plot: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.
similars.stars: Archie Renaux, Jared Leto, Michael Keaton

similars.title: The King's Man
similars.plot: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.
similars.stars: Ralph Fiennes, Harris Dickinson, Gemma Arterton

similars.title: Halloween Kills
similars.plot: The saga of Michael Myers and Laurie Strode continues in the next thrilling chapter of the Halloween series.
similars.stars: Anthony Michael Hall, Judy Greer, Jamie Lee Curtis

similars.title: The Matrix 4
similars.stars: Keanu Reeves, Jessica Henwick, Carrie-Anne Moss

similars.title: Top Gun: Maverick
similars.plot: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.
similars.stars: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

similars.title: Sherlock Holmes 3
similars.plot: The plot is unknown at this time.
similars.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Eddie Marsan, Jude Law

similars.title: Candyman
similars.plot: A "spiritual sequel" to the horror film Candyman (1992) that returns to the now-gentrified Chicago neighborhood where the legend began.
similars.stars: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Teyonah Parris, Nathan Stewart-Jarrett
